pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal and Fast Univariate Clustering // A fast dynamic programming algorithm for optimal univariate clustering. Minimizing the sum of squares of within-cluster distances, the algorithm guarantees optimality and reproducibility. Its advantage over heuristic clustering algorithms in efficiency and accuracy is increasingly pronounced as the number of clusters k increases. With optional weights, the algorithm can also optimally segment time series and perform peak calling. An auxiliary function generates histograms that are adaptive to patterns in data. This package provides a powerful alternative to heuristic methods for univariate data analysis.
